description:
Available languages: english - french 

Presentation 

Byke's-Collection is a rapidity game where you need reflexes. At each level you 
complete, you enrich your collection of new photos of bykes. You can free 20 bykes pictures through 20 levels of play. 
The increasing difficulty will solicit your reflexes! 


Type: Casual / reflexes game 

Collect elegant pictures of bikes when you finish a level successfully. Bikes's collection is a game of skill and speed where you have to tuch cards that present themselves to you before they disappear. 

Using the screen click through 20 levels with progressive difficulty. 

Features : 

-fun game 
-Three levels of difficulty 
-Intuitive controls and clear interface 
-Automatic backup of progression. 
-Progression rewarded with 20 pictures of bikes available in your collection 
-20 levels to complete 
-A set of simple and addictive Shooting
